name: Bottles
description: This is unquestionably one of the best ways to advertise your product. It is apparent that the way a brand packages a drink determines how well the drink will resonate with its target audience. Thus, the Inflatable Bottles appear in such a manner that allows your potential customer to view your product and all of its characteristics. Furthermore, not only will your consumer be able to identify with your product, the inflatable bottle being on-premise during the course of the event, helps to retain the image of your product in the consumers mindset.

name: Arches
description: This product is in high demand for sporting events and parties. Thanks to the prominent visibility, these inflatable arches are ideal for advertising. We have many models on offer to satisfy the needs of our customers, depending on the type of event. Following the initial model and design stage, the inflatable arch is custom-made and personalized with the corporate logo.

name: Screens
description: Easy assemblage and transportation for this inflatable product. The inflatable movie screen is ideal for business events, marketing promotions, product launches, brands and product presentations and much more. The inflatable models are available for interior and exterior use and can be made in any measurement and color.

name: Balloons
description: The inflatable globes are suitable for nocturnal advertising as they are legible in interior lighting.The initial goal of the inflatable globe is to attract the attention of your potential customer from all angles. In any promotion or event they serve as additional support and are in place to add balance to your events. Added advertising support for all kinds of events, information centers, real-estate functions, promotion of new works etc.

name: Mini-Inflatables
description: Attract attention to your business or event with this inflatable advertising balloon. It's a cost-effective and attention-grabbing marketing solution.

name: Inflatable Movie Screen
description: Create a memorable movie night experience with this inflatable movie screen. Perfect for outdoor cinema events and backyard movie nights.
